title: Chapter 20 In a Biscuit Factory

A biscuit is so crisp and tasty.

We all love biscuits.

We get different types of biscuits in shops.
They come in colourful packets.

They are made in a factory.

But how are biscuits made in a factory ?
Let’s find out.
